org.dynalang.dynalink.support

Class AutoDiscovery

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dynalang.dynalink.support.AutoDiscovery

  • public class AutoDiscovery
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides methods for automatic discovery of all guarding dynamic linkers listed in the /META-INF/services/org.dynalang.dynalink.GuardingDynamicLinker resources of all JAR files for a particular class loader. Ordinarily, you will not use this class directly, but you will use a DynamicLinkerFactory instead.

      AutoDiscovery()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.List<GuardingDynamicLinker> loadLinkers()
      Discovers all guarding dynamic linkers listed in JAR files of the context class loader of the current thread.
      static java.util.List<GuardingDynamicLinker> loadLinkers(java.lang.ClassLoader cl)
      Discovers all guarding dynamic linkers listed in JAR files of the specified class loader.

    • Method Detail

      • loadLinkers

        public static java.util.List<GuardingDynamicLinker> loadLinkers()
        Discovers all guarding dynamic linkers listed in JAR files of the context class loader of the current thread.
        Returns:
        a list of available linkers. Can be zero-length list but not null.

      • loadLinkers

        public static java.util.List<GuardingDynamicLinker> loadLinkers(java.lang.ClassLoader cl)
        Discovers all guarding dynamic linkers listed in JAR files of the specified class loader.
        Parameters:
        cl - the class loader to use
        Returns:
        a list of guarding dynamic linkers available through the specified class loader. Can be zero-length list but not null.
